name: CALLIGRAPHY #12 - Just sit.
description: Once upon a time I was a workaholic filling my endless days with thoughts and tasks and goals. Then I crashed and burned. I exhausted mindbodyspirit. ___ I subsequently embarked in a years-long journey of meditation and healing to realign the soul. ___ One mantra I would continue to come across, as a course-correction to an overactive mind, is to “just sit.” To sit the body, which subsequently allows the mind to sit.  No need to visualize things, no need to learn a new philosophy or life hack, no need to distract the mind with more contents. Just sit. And sit. And sit some more. Here I found rest. ___ Today this meditation-via-words continues to stand as a simple powerful practice to cut through the overactive mind on a moment-by-moment-by-moment basis. ___ As soon as I notice the mind run away from me…JUST SIT. Meaning just allow the mind to sit and settle. ___ I continue to write down this mantra in many places as a regular reminder. Such is the intention with this NFT. I wish it brings you the same value. <3
